author: Special Correspondent
text:
Man kills

wife

Peenya police on Monday arrested a tea vendor for strangling his wife to death for chatting on WhatsApp. Kallesh (28), who had a stall in Sunkadakatte, had married his niece Priyanka (19), a B.A. student in Dasarahalli, 18 months ago.

The police have tracked down Kallesh, who was in hiding in his hometown Kadur.
title: Man kills wife for chatting with friend
